title: Pimax Crystal Light Prime PCVR Headset - 8K Resolution, Up to 120Hz, PC Virtual Reality with Controllers, Support SteamVR Games, High Clarity VR for Flight Simulator, Compatible with MSFS, iRacing

features: 【Pimax Subscription Plan】The cost is divided into two parts: pay upfront payment on Amazon, use the headset for 14 days after activation, then choose to pay subscription fee. This helps reduce financial pressure compared to full payment.

【VR Gaming Headset for PC】Pimax Crystal Light is designed for players seeking a high-end VR experience, offering lossless, high-fidelity visual effects through PC device transmission, taking immersive experiences to the next level with stunning visual performance.
【Compatible with SteamVR】Particularly suitable for flight/racing sims with demanding graphics, delivering precision in complex scenes, and also compatible with other popular VR games.

【Immersive High-Resolution Graphics】The 4K resolution of 2880 x 2880 per eye and a wide field of view ensure that every detail is captured, ultra-clear high pixels per degree (35 PPD) makes even tiny words in the games clearly visible.

【Realistic Night View】Equipped with a QLED panel and advanced local dimming technology, it delivers deeper blacks and higher contrast, enhancing detail in dark scenes for a more immersive gaming experience.
【Plug and Play】The Crystal Light is base station free and easy to set up, simply connect to your computer and follow the instructions in the Pimax Play software.
【High-Transparency Optical Lenses】Features glass aspheric lenses for superior light transmission, producing sharper images and more vibrant colors across the entire field of view.
【Foveation Rendering 2.0】Utilizes binocular fixed foveated rendering to reduce GPU load while maintaining central image clarity significantly.
【30% lighter than CRYSTAL】More focused PCVR headset, the front and back weight ratio has been redesigned to be more suitable for long-term wear.
【No Worries After Sale】Amazon’s rapid customer service and One-on-One Technical Support (Pimax Support), 30 days return.
